Header: Bond Commission to request PM Wickremesinghe to testify
Content: The Presidential Commission of Inquiry Investigating into the Bond Issue, is to request Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe to testify before the Commission. During today’s proceedings, it was said that a date will be announced, in due course, for Premier Wickremesinghe to testify. Proceedings of the Presidential Commission of Inquiry Investigating into the Bond Issue resumed the hearing of evidence today, following the President’s approval to extend the Commission’s term by a further six weeks.
